column5: While out for a drive,I seen the big signage on the building. MMA. Talking to a guy at the gym today,it would seem Gary Goodrich is the owner and operator. I may just have to look into this.
Was it UFC??  or just a random MMA organization?  Where abouts, molson centre?
Whelem rd. Across from Devilbis. It is MMA. I remember meeting Gary way back when in Brampton, when I was into the arm wrestling. He would whoop   left or right handed.
Fight University. It's a new MMA gym operated by Gary Goodridge on Welham Road in the South End. My brother is the head wrestling coach
Goodridge is awesome. My Thai Boxing Coach was also his Thai coach. The man is a beast!
Steve Any word on when it will be open?
it was supposed to be a couple weeks ago, so probably soon

Well now Brian you are going to have to drop from the light heavy-weight category to the welterweight!   If you lose any more you will have to box! Gary will do well there, He is one big dude with an even bigger heart! Very nice guy, wouldn't hurt a flea, except in the ring!  Rob C
Hey Rob howz going bud. Good seeing you last weekend. I really did not want to get as low as I have,so I need to put on a few pounds. Boxing eh??????????? I wear glasses,that would hurt.LOL
